// ---------------- Vending Area -----------------------

payo1,101,108,5	script	Vending Area#1	837,{

	mes "[Payon]";
	mes "This is the entrance to the vending area.";
	mes "Vending is only allowed there.";
	mes "Please keep B/S/T chats to the right of this sign.";
	mes "Would you like to go to the vending area?";
	menu "Ok!",go_vend,"Meh~",cancel_vend;
go_vend:
	warp "force_1-2.gat",	173,	121; end;
cancel_vend:
	close;
}
